10 (0) REM MATRIX FUNCTION RND2()
15 (1) DIM D(2, 3)
20 (1) MAT A = RND2(3, 5, 10)
30 (1) MAT B = RND2(5, 3, 2)
40 (1) MAT C = RND2(4)
45 (1) MAT D = RND2
50 (1) PRINT "MATRIX A"
60 (1) MAT PRINT A;
70 (1) PRINT "MATRIX B"
80 (1) MAT PRINT B;
90 (1) PRINT "ARRAY C"
100 (1) MAT PRINT C;
110 (1) PRINT "MATRIX D"
120 (1) MAT PRINT D;
200 (1) OPTION BASE 1
220 (1) MAT A = RND2(3, 5, 10)
230 (1) MAT B = RND2(5, 3, 5)
240 (1) MAT C = RND2(4)
245 (1) MAT D = RND2()
250 (1) PRINT "MATRIX A"
260 (1) MAT PRINT A;
270 (1) PRINT "MATRIX B"
280 (1) MAT PRINT B;
290 (1) PRINT "ARRAY C"
300 (1) MAT PRINT C;
310 (1) PRINT "MATRIX D"
320 (1) MAT PRINT D;
999 (1) END
